query.text: declare @c_acc varchar(4000), @title nvarchar(1024), @Colors varchar(8000) select @c_acc = c_acc from biform where form_id = '002' select @title = case when @@language = 'V' then ten_vung else ten_vung2 end from dbfield where field_id = 'C002' select @Colors = coalesce(@Colors + ',', '') + lower(mau) from dbcolor exec ds_Dashboard002 'C002', '013', '', @c_acc, default, @@language, @@userID, @@admin select filter_time = '013', filter_unit = '', filter_type = 'pie', @title as title, case when @@language = 'v' then N'Đơn vị tính: %' else N'Unit of Measure: %' end as subtitle, case when @@language = 'v' then N'Không có dữ liệu!' else N'No Data!' end as defaultData, @Colors as colors

declare @c_acc varchar(4000), @title nvarchar(1024), @Colors varchar(8000) select @c_acc = c_acc from biform where form_id = '002' select @title = case when @@language = 'V' then ten_vung else ten_vung2 end from dbfield where field_id = 'C002' select @Colors = coalesce(@Colors + ',', '') + lower(mau) from dbcolor exec ds_Dashboard002 'C002', @@$time, @@$unit, @c_acc, default, @@language, @@userID, @@admin select filter_time = @@$time, filter_unit = @@$unit, filter_type = 'pie', @title as title, case when @@language = 'v' then N'Đơn vị tính: %' else N'Unit of Measure: %' end as subtitle, case when @@language = 'v' then N'Không có dữ liệu!' else N'No Data!' end as defaultData, @Colors as colors
